body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Pets              Pets       Your pets are welcome at Fort Raleigh National Historic Site. Your pet must be on a leash no longer than 6' at all times. Pets are not allowed in buildings. Please, for your pet's sake, never leave them unattended. Also, for everyone's and the environment's sake, clean up after your pet.
title: Fort Raleigh National Historic Site: Pets
